text: Tillandsia 'Munro's Filiformis', also known in the U.S. by the trade designations Tillandsia usneoides and , is a natural form of Tillandsia usneoides (Spanish moss) with very fine, green leaves that is native to Paraguay. It conforms to the description of the now-defunct variety Tillandsia usneoides var. filiformis (André) Mez. Tillandsia usneoides 'Munro's Filiformis' ==References== *BSI BCR Entry for Tillandsia 'Munro's Filiformis' Category:Bromeliaceae cultivar
title: Tillandsia 'Munro's Filiformis'
